I know my team when we go out we have two way radios and cellphones so ther=

cept prayers.But the only time we had to be loud is when I was attacked.

Im sitting here watching Ghost Hunters...and I know alot of=
 it is done for drama purposes...but Im curious...when ya'll are out on an =
investigation do you talk as much as they do?=A0 I can hardly hear anything=
 over them chatting.=A0 Also I notice a cpl of their people freak out when =
they get knocks or other responses... nobody ever says hey thanks for the e=
ffort you put into responding or great job or anything like that..its alway=
s wtf was that, what the hell is going on in here, etc...do ya'll say thank=
s and compliment the efforts of the responding spirits?=A0 Ive never been o=
n an investigation with a team so Im kinda curious how different groups wor=
k and run things.(wish I knew people in arizona I could go on an investigat=

onse to one of the responses Ive gotten.=A0 Anyways just curious.=A0 Hope e=
veryone has a
 great weekend!

<DIV>Tom<BR><BR>--- On <B>Sat, 12/13/08, Rhonda W <I><rhondak1973@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style="PADDING-LEFT: 5px; MARGIN-LEFT: 5px; BORDER-LEFT: rgb(16,16,255) 2px solid">From: Rhonda W <rhondak1973@...><BR>Subject: [EVP-ITC]cpl question for team investigators<BR>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<BR>Date: Saturday, December 13, 2008, 7:55 AM<BR><BR>
<DIV id=yiv111630780>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>
<DIV>
<TABLE cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TBODY>
<TR>
<TD vAlign=top>
<DIV>Im sitting here watching Ghost Hunters...and I know alot of it is done for drama purposes...but Im curious...when ya'll are out on an investigation do you talk as much as they do?  I can hardly hear anything over them chatting.  Also I notice a cpl of their people freak out when they get knocks or other responses... nobody ever says hey thanks for the effort you put into responding or great job or anything like that..its always wtf was that, what the hell is going on in here, etc...do ya'll say thanks and compliment the efforts of the responding spirits?  Ive never been on an investigation with a team so Im kinda curious how different groups work and run things.(wish I knew people in arizona I could go on an investigation with)  I know when I do my research here with my radio shack hack I always say thanks and am polite and have never freaked out or cussed in response to one of the responses Ive gotten.  Anyways just
 curious.  Hope everyone has a great weekend!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Rhonda</DIV></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE><BR></DIV></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table>
